/*
	源网址后面不要加##，没做兼容
	
	发布页

exploreUrl:
<js>
//状态
novelState = [
	{	title: '全部', type: 0},
	{	title: '连载', type: 1},
	{	title: '完结', type: 2}
]
//分类
novelSort = [
	{	title: '　全部　', type: 0},
	{	title: '玄幻奇幻', type: 1},
	{	title: '仙侠武侠', type: 2},
	{	title: '都市言情', type: 3},
	{	title: '穿越历史', type: 4},
	{	title: '科幻灵异', type: 5},
	{	title: '  藏经阁  ', type: 6},
	{	title: '其他类别', type: 7}
]
//排序
novelRank = [
	{ title: '  更新  ', type: 'lastupdate'},
	{ title: '总人气', type: 'allvisit'},
	{ title: '月人气', type: 'monthvisit'},
	{ title: '  字数  ', type: 'size'},
	{ title: '  新书  ', type: 'postdate'}
]

list = [];
formatUrl = (sort, rank, state) => {
	return `{{eval(String(source.loginUrl));_getUrl();}}shuku/${sort}-${rank}-${state}-{{page}}.html`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (stateItem of novelState) {
	pushItem(`🚫小说状态---${stateItem.title}🚫`, "", 1);
	for (rankItem of novelRank) {
		novelSort[0].title = "📫" + rankItem.title;
		for (sortItem of novelSort) {
			pushItem(`${sortItem.title}`, formatUrl(sortItem.type, rankItem.type, stateItem.type), sortItem.type > 5 ? 0.45 : 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>
header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>

ruleSearch.author: td.2@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
// 百度OCR 识别验证码 by 酷安@靈狐
function concat(o,split){
	let result=''
	for(i in o){
		let v=o[i]
		v=v&&'='+java.encodeURI(v)||''
		result+=result==''&&i+v||split+i+v
	}
	return result
}
function ocr(base64){
	let data={
		image:'data:image/jpeg;base64,'+base64,
		image_url:null,
		type:'https://aip.baidubce.com/rest/2.0/ocr/v1/general_basic',
		detect_direction:false,
		language_type:'ENG'
		}
		let body=concat(data,'&')
		let result=''
		let url='https://ai.baidu.com/aidemo'
		let res=java.post(url,body,{'referer':url})
		json=JSON.parse(res.body())
		json=json.data.words_result
		for(i in json){
			result+=json[i].words
		}
		return result
}
max_try=10
try_times=0
while(result.match('验证码')){
img=source.getKey()+'/'+java.getString('img@src')
res=org.jsoup.Jsoup.connect(img).ignoreContentType(true).ignoreHttpErrors(true).execute()
cookie=concat(res.cookies(),';')
data=res.bodyAsBytes()
b=Packages.cn.hutool.core.codec.Base64
base64=b.encode(data)
yzm=ocr(base64).replace(/[^\w]/g,'')
//yzm=java.getVerificationCode(img)
msg='提交验证码：'+yzm
java.log(msg)
java.toast(msg)
n=java.getStringList('input@name')
v=java.getStringList('input@value')
u=java.getString('form@action')
body=n[0]+'='+v[0]+'&'+n[1]+'='+yzm
header=JSON.parse(source.header)
header['cookie']=String(cookie)
res=java.post(u,body,header)
jump=res.header("Location")
if(jump){
	if(!jump.match(/search/)){
		jump=source.getKey()+'/'+jump
		java.put('src',java.ajax(jump))
		source.bookUrlPattern=''
		info=source.bookInfoRule.init
		js="<"+"js>java.get('src')</"+"js>"
		source.bookInfoRule.init=js+info
		toc=source.tocRule.chapterList
		source.tocRule.chapterList=js+toc
		break
	}
}else{result=res.body()}
if(try_times>=max_try){break}
try_times+=1
}
result
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

ruleBookInfo.author: [property="og:novel:author"]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property="og:novel:latest_chapter_name"]@content
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property="og:novel:book_name"]@content

ruleContent.content: id.chaptercontent@html##（.*阅读模式.*）|请收藏.*com|『点此报错』『加入书签』|\(本章完\)|第.*章.*|.*点此报错.*

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}

	}))

if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ intro=java.get("intro1"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ vipc=/^DcAWGQtI44o=$/.test(content)?JSON.parse(src).message:java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content) result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} }else{result="‎"} //评论开启 bbb = book.getVariable("custom") sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ java.log(sss) let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList; commentb = ""; for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;
num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

//下面被注释的代码是已经有章节数的前面就不加序号了
bbb = book.getVariable("custom");
sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}else{num=num}

title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	title = title + " ❖ "+intro
	}else{
		title = title
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
v=vip&&!type?' ◇':'';
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l+v;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写 [目录简介] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现
填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

2、源变量（所有书）
其余同书籍变量
填写[搜索+书名] —— 必须在第一行，搜索百合书籍，在发现里点击[百合搜索]

更改过后都要重新刷新

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/page=2/)){
result=""
}else{
allpage=result.match(/class='redtext'>([^<]+)</)[1];
list=[];

len=allpage>10?10:allpage;

start=1;end=len;
if(book.getVariable("custom")!=""){
start=book.getVariable("custom").match(/(\d+)-\d+/)[1];
end=book.getVariable("custom").match(/\d+-(\d+)/)[1];
}

for(i=start;i<=end;i++){
list.push(baseUrl+"&page="+i)
}
list
}
</js>

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)
</js>

	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

bookSourceComment:
//网站经常变动
//同站：舞文小说http://m.wushuzw.org/

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.intro: .intro.0@text##阅读.*最新章节请关注.+|【展开】|【收起】
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##{{chapter.title}}| \(第.*页\)|（本章未完.+继续阅读）|阅读.*最新章节.*请关注.+

ruleSearch.author: a@ownText##.*[(]|[):]|[【】].+
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su){
	source.setVariable(bu);
//	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>
.bd li
ruleSearch.name: a@ownText##[()].+|.*[:【]|】

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
d=java.getElements("#listsss div");
var li="";
for(i in d){
	li+=d.select(`[data-id=${i}] li`);
	li+="\n";
	}
	li;
</js>
li a

}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

function sign(list){
    var sb='2bb6ffe20b1eff00';
    list=list.sort();
    for(var i=0;i<list.length;i++){if(i==0){sb+=list[i];}else{sb+="&";sb+=list[i];}}
    sb+="cabf8a3adca20e831d7e96267f709032";
    return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase();
}

	url: baseUrl.replace(/book/,'read'),
};
book;

<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

json=JSON.parse(result).items;}

//判定json里是否有items

json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!/apk\/detail/.test(baseUrl)){
    let id = "{{$.data.id}}";
    let html = ""
    let item = JSON.parse(result).data;
    let curPage = 1;
    let lastItem = "";
    let resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id={{$.data.id}}&page=1&lastItem="));
    let replynum5 = item.replynum;
    replynum5 > 100?replynum5=100:replynum5
    html += createReply(item)
    let item_reply = []
    let totalnum = 0
    let item2 = resp2.data
    item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    while (item2.length && (totalnum = totalnum + item2.length) < replynum5) {
      curPage = curPage + 1
      lastItem = item2[item2.length - 1].id
      resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id=${id}&page=${curPage}&lastItem=${lastItem}`))
      item2 = resp2.data
      item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    }

    let grouped_item_reply = {}
    item_reply.map(item => {
      if (item.rrid) {
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] = grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid].push(item)
      } else {
        grouped_item_reply[item.id] = grouped_item_reply[item.id] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.id].push(item)
      }
    })
    for (key in grouped_item_reply) {
      grouped_item_reply[key].sort((e1, e2) => {
        return e1.dateline - e2.dateline
      }).map(item => html += createReply(item, !!item.rrid))
    }
    result = String(html).replace(/<a .*?href="([^"]+)".*?>([^<]+)<\/a>/g,'▪$2：$1▪')
   }else{
   	let html = "软件地址：\nhttps://www.coolapk.com/apk/{{$.data.apkname}}\n";
   	 html +="---复制下面文字到发现规则可看评论---\n"
   	html += "{{$.data.title}}▪回复::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=&title=最近回复&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪发布::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id=256030&sort=dateline_desc&title=最近发布&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪热度::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=popular&title=热度排序&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"
   	}
</js>

    java.log(java.ajax(source.getKey() + ajax(c2)));

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

for(i in lis){
	surl=lis[i].attr('href')
	if(surl!=''){
		temp={
			"name":lis[i].text(),
			"surl":surl
			}
			list.push(temp)
		}
		surl=''
	}
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
	list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

bookSourceComment:
/*同站一大堆
修复搜索，可设置源变量限制搜索数量
优化by:游客2580
搜索加载by:Thomas&&youke2580
同类型网站可以自行替换网址*/

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*
ruleSearch.name: $.articlename

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
